text: Gyllengul öl med mycket skum. Överhuvudtaget känns det som det är lite väl mycket kolsyra. Doft och smak av persika, grapefrukt, tallbarr, jäst och bröd. Känns tunnare än många av de riktigt bra low-alcohol ölen.
Bottle. Pours a hazy golden color with a small white head. Has a fruity malty weak citrus hoppy peachy aroma. Fruity malty peachy citrus hoppy flavor. Has a fruity malty peachy citrus hoppy finish.

330 ml bottle. Brewed on 151110. (ICA) Stockholm, Sweden.
Clear golden color with a huge foamy off-white head.
Not that pretty. Floral hops, mild bitterness, mild sweetness and some malt in the aroma. Not the freshest aroma. The flavor is floral and fruit tea hops, moderate bitterness, dryness, tree leaves and malt. Nåjå...

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
330ml bottle from a supermarket somewhere in Sodermalm. Pours hazy amber, small foam head. Light tropical aroma. Taste is soapy, floral, grainy, more soap and tropical notes. Highish carbonation. Ok.

Pours murky amber with low white head
Aromas of malty bread, tropical fruits, hints of caramel
Taste has fruity hoppyness, malty bready backbone, wee bit cardboard
Bit too carbonated - growing in the mouth, dry, medium bitter, low bodied
Fonefan 280215. Deep golden-orange colour with an off-white head. Aroma is grapefruit, malt, fruit. Flavour is grapefruit, malt, fruit, pine, grain, floral. Ordinary beer.

Aroma: Smelling of bread, grape-fruit, pine and yeast. Rather weak.Appearance: A hazy amber colored beer. A high off-white head with good lacing and some curtains.Taste: Tasting toffee, grape-fruit, pine and peel.Palate: Medium high carbonation, a watery texture. A small body with a dry finish.Overall: In all a very good low alcohol IPA.Note: Bottle 330 ml at home. Reviewed 2015-07-21.

330ml bottle from Ica Aptiten, Stockholm. Lots of foam in the glass, it takes time to pour it. Hazy dark golden, the big head is white and fluffy, leaving lacing. Hoppy, citrus aroma. Highly carbonated with small sharp bubbles, round and fizzy mouthfeel. Light taste of caramel, nuts and citrus. Finish with a short grapefruit bitterness.
330 ml bottle at home. Slightly hazy amber with whiteish head. Aroma malty, soap, yeast and hops with tropical fruit. Taste is fairly dry, bitter, yeast and light fruit. Bitter finish
Bottle at The Carnival Tasting in Ulfborg Denmark 2015-02-28. Clear golden beer with an offwhite head. Hoppy grassy fruity aroma. Similar flavour.
light fruit hoppy aroma,amber, hazy, off white foam, light sweetness, lightly bitter, medium body, oily feel, bitter, long finish,
Golden coloured and unclear. Has a white head, medium duration. Heavy fruity, hoppy aroma. Flavor starts faint sweet, then bitter, dry, thin.

How: Bottle.
Where: NK Saluhall, Stockholm.
Appearance: Hazy amber colour with a very large off-white head.
Aroma: Tropical fruit, citrus, caramel, malt.
Body: Light body, medium carbonation.
Flavour: Tropical fruit, a bit floral, citrus, some grass.
citrus, grass, dough, caramel, cheese, amber, hazy, frothy, light sweetness, medium bitterness, light body, thin feel, bitter,

Bottle 330ml. @ Carnival Tasting 2015, Denmark. [ As PangPang Waikiki ].Clear medium orange yellow color with a average, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, off-white head. Aroma is moderate malty, pale malt, light caramel, moderate hoppy, orange - citrus, licorice hops. Flavor is moderate sweet and bitter with a average to long duration, citrus, pale malt, thin. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is soft. [20150228]

Aroma is fruity, floral and mild cardboardy notes. Flavour is fruity, floral, mildly earthy and also has some slight cardboardy notes to it.

Bottle. A hazy, golden-orange beer with a dense, finger-thick off-white head. The aroma is piney and grapefruity, with some grainy malts in the back. Its medium bodied and a bit heavy on the carbonation, semi-dry, with flavors of grains in the back. Resins, grapefruit and some flowery and peachy hints in the flavor. Pleasant bitterness too, lasting for some time. For a 2.8% beer its sure a fine one, but it lacks some quenching qualities. 150228

Bottle at Carnival Tasting in Ulfborg 2015-02-28. Clear golden beer with a quite nice offwhite head. Hoppy citrus aroma, mango, pine, grassy notes. Hoppy citrus flavor, floral, mango, hay, grassy, peach notes. Lacking maltprofile bit this is a good thirst quencher.
Bitterer, mild hopfiger Antrunk. Für den Alkoholgehalt definitiv ok, insgesamt ist der Hopfen aber etwas wässrig, die Bitterkeit gerade noch im angenehmem Rahmen. Ok. 12/9/7/7/8/8

Bottled, from NK, Stockholm.  Hazy amber, rich head. Generous aroma of passion fruit and mango. Dry with very light body and thin mouthfeel. Passinfruit hops that is replaced by resin and metal in the finish. Nice hop character, but the malt is too clean/hard to hold up with this low gravity.
Flaska från ICA Liljeholmen. Bra doft med toner av grape och ananas. Tjockt och fluffigt skum. Tyvärr motsvarar inte smaken den lovande inledningen men det får man acceptera med så pass alkoholhalt.
330ml Bottle - Amber with a slight haze and a foamy head. Peach, pine and nuts in the aroma. Biscuity and moderately hoppy taste with hobnobs and peach detected.

Bottle from NK Saluhall. 

Amber with a large white head. Hoppy with pineapple, citrus and something that reminded of strawberries. Light and fresh. A very descent low alcohol beer.

Bottle from NK. 
Pours redish amber with a big head. 
Hoppy taste of passion fruit and blood orange. Well balanced for the amount of hops and low abv.

Bottled from Ica Åkered
Deep golden with a small, white head. 
Flory, piney, perfume-ish hops in the aroma. 
Fresh with a light body. Medium bitterness. 
Piney flavour.
